author: jmason
msg: lots of bugs fixed.  1195: adds additional support for vpomail virtual users, thanks to Matt Simerson (spamassassin@blockads.com).  all SA front-end scripts now use taint mode by default.  Doco from Francesco Potorti.  FORGED_HOTMAIL_RCVD split into 2 tests.  --nouser-config was not implemented, fixed.
